title: St Anthony Mary Claret Novena
description: St Anthony Mary Claret was a 19th century Spanish Catholic archbishop and missionary. Pray this novena for textile merchants, weavers, prudentially saving money, Catholic press, Claretians Missionary Sons of the Immaculate Heart of Mary, Diocese of the Canary Islands, Claretian Students, Educators, and Technical and Vocational Educators.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

St. Anthony Mary Claret, during your life on earth you often comforted the afflicted and showed tender love and compassion for the sick and sinful. Now that you rejoice in the reward of your virtues in heavenly glory, I humbly ask that you intercede for me in my needs (mention request here‚Ä¶) and grant my prayer, if such be the will of God. Make my troubles your own. Speak a word for me to the Immaculate Heart of Mary to obtain by her powerful intercession the grace I yearn for so ardently. Through your prayers may she also obtain for me a blessing to strengthen me during life, to assist me at the hour of death, and to lead me to a happy eternity. Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Anthony Mary Claret, pray for us!
